content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-25 in colorado springs and as i was about to go under an overpass i noticed 3 lights in the air. it caught by attention cause 2 were green, which i have never seen in the air. the other light was bright white at the front of the craft and was slowly blinking. the lights were configured in a triangle shape and it appeared to be very dark. it also seemed like the sky was darker in the area to hide the craft even though it was just passed dusk. when i was able to look back to see if it was there it had vanished.
content.summary: One white light and two green lights low to ground in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I used to wake up at 3:30 a.M. to take a bath and then go on the enclosed porch where i could watch the news and have coffee before i give it up for day shift. while i was sitting on the couch, watching tv, drinking my coffee, the tv glitched and a slight wind picked up. it was kind of a balmy morning so i had the main door open with the screen door closed and the bottom of the screen door to ventilate the porch. something drew my attention to the door and when i looked on the glass portion of the window i saw some type of entity. it looked like i had big eyes and a hand. i quickly took a photograph and it disappeared in about a minute. after that incident i was always nervous to sit on the porch. one morning it was raining out and i had the door open and i looked up and somebody's dog came and picked his head in the door. scared the heck out of me. i was a military policeman in the united states army. i have been a police officer for almost 15 years. so i'm hesitant i'm reporting this, but maybe you guys can shed some light on it.
content.summary: Having coffee in porch prior to gearing up for work

content.detailedDescription: After dropping a friend home after sunday evening youth service, my sister and i were heading home. i glanced at the sky from my car window and saw a shape with flashing lights. it didn't look like a plane or a blimp (blimps were fairly common sights at that time for advertising). i stopped the car and watched, trying to figure out what it was.  my sister wanted to know why i had stopped.  as i watched, i noticed the general shape- a round to oval shaped object with a central band of lights around the middle, almost like windows.  each "window" lit up in sequence with a pause as the the sequence must have continued around the back side of the object. the sequence went from my left to right.  the window flashes were not uniform in color.  they ranged from blue to yellow to orange.  suddenly it darted to the right, changed direction and traveled up, and then came back to almost the original location.  i was stunned and told my sister that i thought we were seeing at a ufo.  i pulled into a driveway and watched through the front windshield as the object continued to dart and hover.  it then traveled straight out and away from us, getting smaller.  it stopped, darted right, came back toward us becoming larger.  it hovered, moved right, came toward us more, becoming larger.  i backed the car out and headed to my friend's house.  i wanted her and her dad to see it, too.  i told my sister to watch it and it started to travel away from us.  by the time we got to my friend's house, it was very small, like a star, and getting fainter all the time.  it just disappeared.  my sister, who is 3 years younger, never really looked at it, and has no recollection of this event today.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval shaped object with central strip of alternating flashing lights observed in sky hovering and zooming in and out

content.detailedDescription: I was on an aircanada flight from toronto to ottawa , were were approaching the airport , approximately 2 minutes to touchdown , i saw a bright white orb / light hovering approximately 500 ft. away starboard side equal elevation , i estimate it to be 3 ft. diameter max ,as we flew to where it was beside us , it ascended rapidly straight up until it was out of sight,
content.summary: I was on an air canada flight from toronto to ottawa , 2 minutes before landing we were passing a small hovering light and as we flew paralell with the object it darted straight up rapidly until it was out of sight

content.detailedDescription: [link moved/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Broadcast

content.detailedDescription: I was staying with my uncle in northeast ohio it was the early morning around 2am of september 13th. i had awakened to the sound of one of my uncles dogs growling and slowly walking across the room towards the kitchen. as soon as i had gotten adjusted to the dark and my sight had fully come to me i realized that there were 3 figures between 7-9 feet tall standing by the window in-between the living room where i was sleeping and the kitchen. they were solid bright white with a feminine presence long white hair with long white gowns going to their feet. they just stood and looked at me and i was completely paralyzed by fear. this went on for about 10 minutes before i closed my eyes tight and when i had opened them up the figures were gone so i went back to sleep. i believe fully that i saw extra terrestrials that night. why they were watching me i do not know but i feel that they will be back.
content.summary: It was not

content.detailedDescription: Went out on a hike saw a egg shaped thing silver metallic looking then there was a flash and it was gone
content.summary: Terrifying

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling to my home in oxford, maine after leaving work in mass. as a police officer. i decided not to travel the turnpike as if in the event i broke down with my 1987 ambulance converted into an ice truck. i was on rte 202 /4 traveling north . i was on a long  straight away, near buxton a very isolated area not a rural . i observed a red light in the sky i thought they must have put a traffic control red light stop across
the road , i was traveling approx 55mph  and thought that was weird not signs saying approaching intersection . the light did not move as i got closer , the light disappeared . i detected a very strong smell of what i thought was an ozone smell . i stopped and exited to see if there was a light no light  or intersection or cross roads anywhere. i thought i must be seeing things , i still bothers me today as i believe it was a ufo
content.summary: Red light in sky thought was newly installed traffic control

content.detailedDescription: Someone has already contacted me from mufon, but i've heard nothing back yet! i will tell you all about it!
content.summary: Diamond shaped 3 whhite lights and a red pulsating one in the middle of the craft

content.detailedDescription: My grandmother had come to wisconsin to pick me up. we stopped at my aunts house(a mobile home) in the country. i was up in the living room and looked out the window of the front door. i saw the object and called grandmother. i looked at the clock by the door and it was 9 p.M. the object was above a field across the street and when she came to the door it started to move soundlessly it disappeared behind the trees. moments later i looked out the door and noticed it back over the field. i looked at the clock and it was midnight. grandmother was feisty and went out the door to investigate. it disappeared like turning off a switch. this would have been the end of the story except that after my military service i went to help my mother move to fla. and she had a winnebego motor home. we stopped at a rest stop in the hills of tennessee and i slept on the upper bunk above the cab the next morning my pillow had a large area  of blood from one side of my nose and in the middle of of it was a large black crystal. i left it there and we sold the motor home later. wish i knew where those three hours went.
content.summary: Looked like  a full moon only brighter

content.detailedDescription: Watched for several minutes a group of very bright objects moving very slowly. several smaller objects were darting all around it. the formation changed several times. after 20 or so minutes it moved behind the only cloud in the sky....
content.summary: Several bright objects in a formation. smaller objects came and went from it.

content.detailedDescription: All i know is what i seen. the light hit my chest after that my ex wife's daughter had a black light in her room and with the black light on i had writing on my chest only seen by black light on.
content.summary: It affected my body can't understand what these words mean on my chest

content.detailedDescription:
Took the pictures from my car window while the wife was in the store.   did not see object till i took closer inspection of photo.
no other information can i provide but the photo.
content.summary: Took two picture of the sky did not see object till further examination of photo's

content.detailedDescription: It was my birthday when i saw it. i was sitting in the hall after the party then some vibration like sound came i ran to see what it was i saw it with my own eyes a disc flying wobbling as soon as i saw it i ran and fetched my cellphone opened the camera and as soon as i tried to click pictures my phone switched off. it was there for about 5 mins and then it went straight upwards into the sky. when i saw it. it was 1 am at night and after that when i went to sleep 4 days the same ufo came into my dreams. my phone, when i gave it in the shop to get repaired he said there's some motherboard issue with it and then the phone never got fixed
content.summary: It was my birthday when i saw it

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:15pm on march 27, 2015 i went outside in my back yard to let my dog out. i glanced up at the sky above the treeling in my yard and i saw what i initially thought to be three geese flying above the tree top in my back yard but it quickly became apparent these were not birds. there were three boomerang shaped objects flying in a close formation in a steady direction across the sky. the objects gave off no sound whatsoever. they appeared to be grey in the night sky. it is difficult to say if they gave off their own illumination or i was able to see them because of the natural moonlight and/or city lights projecting upward. it was as if they were a light greyish color in a dark night sky. they did block out the sky in the space they occupied. there were no lights on the objects. this was not a sighting of "lights in the sky." what i saw were three distinct crafts. my sighting lasted about 30 seconds, probably a bit less as it did not take long for these objects to move far enough away that they could no longer be visible from my vantage point. when i realized that these were not birds i called for my daughter to come look but by the time she arrived the objects were in the distance so it was difficult to point them out. they quickly were out of viewing range. i wish i had called out earlier because i do not want to be the only one who saw this as i'm certain no one would believe me. but i know what i saw and these were solid objects. not planes, helicopters or birds. i truly hope someone else reports seeing these, either to mufon or any other agency. i know what i saw and i stand by this sighting 100%.  i don't know what they were, i am only certain as to what they were not. i do not have any pictures as i did not have any camera with me.....Not something i usually have with me when i am simply letting the dog out. i just hope someone else saw something that resembles my sighting.
content.summary: Formation of three silent, boomerang shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on porch approximately 10pm looking east at sky while smoking before bed. after a few minutes a light appeared next to lowest star on orians belt. it hovered there a few seconds before traveling slowly straight up along the stars of the belt. when it reached the northern most star on the belt it stopped again for only a few seconds and still had the same bright light that i first saw. then the light shot of in the ne direction at an incredible speed across the sky until the light just vanished. i've watched the sky my whole life and this is my first sighting of a ufo. i know what i saw was nothing man made.
content.summary: Light appeared next to star on orians belt. traveled path along stars on belt. then changed direction ne, shot away , dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping on a bed at my balcony room & was using my binocular see all types of stars & suddenly i saw this starlike shape which can fly toward the sky to the east. this is 7:28pm in kota kinabalu time where i was waiting for dinner downstairs. because of early lights need to off for earth hour. this object like starlike flew very smooth & slowly from the west to the east toward jesselton apartment. i do not have the picture. i just watch it go using my binocular wait & see where it goes so it flew very far towards the east. could this be a fiery flying serpent too which had light on its tail who said was discovered in papua new guinea?
content.summary: today just now at 7:28pm in malaysia time. i saw a bright light exactly like a star  without splashing i mean without flashing & fly very smooth & slowly too without  any sound engine right far away above beyond the sky farther than where an aeroplane us

content.detailedDescription:
Good morning!
what i witnessed about four years ago has plaid on my mind ever since i live in a remote village called middleton-in -teasdale county durham uk  the time was 9.20 pm summer months, didn’t make a note of this date,
i just got back from fly-fishing on the river tees and decided to go out back for a cigarette; i noticed a huge bright white light coming down the dale i
couldn’t see this craft because of the bright  light this craft was flying from the north to south and flying below the cloud sun setting behind the cloud, but there was a gap in the the cloud this craft went vertical in this gap and this is the time i could (identify this craft and it was just like( america’s discovery)so they do have  secret space program!! the craft was  carrying one tank under each wing looked rusty coloured to me) and this is just coincidence the same time the following night another huge bright white  light but flying in or above the cloud  couldn’t see it   but i didn’t have to i no it was another craft going in the same trajectory 
and there you have it america’s secret space program. they must be getting careless with their flight paths!! i wonder where they take off from!
ps
i feel better now i’ve told of my experience, i
rather not have my personal details divulged, don’t  want any unnecessary attention !

regards h h
content.summary: Americas discovery

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out the window, while talking to someone over skype, i see this object above the tree line about a mile or more out from our town. it dims completely and then reappears 20 - 30 seconds later. i continue to watch as it hovers and slightly changes flight path over the coarse of 3-4 mins. 

this might be unrelated, but later that night i had an oscillating migraine. i went partially blind and became dizzy for 30 -45 mins and then regained all control and vision.
content.summary: Orange and gold dot pulsating and changing direction nw from my position.

content.detailedDescription: When i was putting my dog outside at about 1 am this morning, i noticed a ufo.  i always look up to the night sky because we have ufo's that show up every night at dusk. my mom and had watched them on several occasions, as they hovered over lake michigan in south haven. we watched smaller lights come up from the water, and go up to the larger craft. tonight, as i was letting my dog out, one of the the ufo's was a lot lower than usual, so i was particularly interested in it. it was emitting blue and red lights, as it always does.  after taking pictures of it on my cell phone, i woke my mom up so that she could see it. we decided to go for a ride to try and get closer, but as my mom was getting dressed, i noticed that the ufo was no longer there. when i used the zoom on the picture, i noticed that there was a second object that i had not been able to see with my naked eye. it was quite small before i zoomed in on it. this is a very clear triangular shape craft, with what appears to be lights all around it. i was really exited about this picture. my mom suggested that i take a picture of the large light that was higher up in the sky. they stay in the same location for hours, and sometimes they move a little ways and stop again. my old phone could not capture these ufo's at night, but i realized tonight that my new phone could. i knew before i zoomed in, that i had an unusual looking craft in this picture. when i zoomed in it looked like a cylinder shape with a half moon type design on the left side,with a light blue color. on the right side were 2 sideways half egg shapes, that were white. i am not able to attach these pics, unfortunately. several years ago, i along with a few friends, witnessed a small silver disk ufo. we were on motorcycles at a stop light.  this ufo was very close to us. it hovered close to a house in broad daylight.  after a couple minutes, it went straight up and went out of sight very quickly. since then, i have been a ufo enthusiast. i had another sighting a few years later when i was in alabama. i reported that sighting to mufon. i witnessed 2 very large cylinder crafts that were white. it had columns or windows. they were very high up and very large. first it "messed" with my binoculars, and then they went behind a cloud and never went out the other side.
content.summary: I took some pics on my cell phone earlier this morning,of what looks like 2 different ufo's. one of them is triangular and the other appears to be cylinder shaped with strange patterns on it. they appear every night at dusk for about 3 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Sedona, az facing bear mountain and the cockscomb formations. object was well beyond and above the mountain from my vantage point.

i went outside into the pool area to take the table scraps to the far gate for disposal in the morning.  the object caught my eye and i immediately put down the mulch bins and i watched the object for a few minutes, then went into the house for my binoculars and watched a bit more. then i ran into the the casita after remembering we had a small telescope on a tripod.
after seeing it through the telescope i could see something like smaller fuzzy spherical colors within the large red undulating sphere.

i have seen ufos in our area that have also been filmed and aired on national affiliate television stations; much more like actual angular craft. this was different. at one point, i wondered if it was a fireball, but it seemed stationary.

as i continued to watch, i sent a text to a friend to see if she or anyone else she new had seen or was seeing the same thing. no reply.

still keeping vigil, it suddenly just disappeared. no streaks, nothing. just lights out.
content.summary: Red glowing sphere pulsating blurred colors-watched for at least 10 min. then just vanished

content.detailedDescription: It was 4pm i were walking out of a store. i looked across the street and there were two men in black suits, wearing sunglasses and they both had a black umbrella. they were standing perfectly still. i was very paranoid because i'm really into conspiracies and aliens and i read about men in black. as i started walking once i got at least 100 feet in front of them, they crossed the street and started to follow me. the way the moved was very unusual, not like a regular human walking (not implying they weren't human). i turned the corner and looked back and they were gone, it was strange because there was nowhere they could have gone so fast because i kept looking behind me. i went to my house and waited about 30 minutes and went back out to see if i could find anything out if they were still there or something. as i turned the corner, i saw one and i was so startled i fell and one ran to me in a very odd motion, i got up before he/it could reach me and ran home.
content.summary: Wasn't a ufo but a person that followed me almost to my house

content.detailedDescription:
After i sighted ufos other night i noticed a small needle mark and blood where the needle went thru my breast, last night i felt what they did only later .
and this is what i went thru ..Still i think its important to understand and note every detail for future reference .
no matter what happened needs to be recorded . and i wanted to make sure ppl know my problem i have alien abduction
content.summary: After i sighted uf

content.detailedDescription: Woke for some reason at 03:30, my bed is right by my window which was open and faces nnw. i looked out the window and just above treetop level i saw a black triangular object that was silent and moving slowly to the nnw.It was quite large probably about the size of a 737. it had no wings it was just a triangle shape. there was two very bright lights at the rear of the triangle, that seemed to me to be as big as the craft was deep. i did not note any flashing marker lights, it slowly just moved off in the direction i noted with no sounds of any kind. where i stay it is very quiet at that time of the morning so if it had made any type of noise i would have heard it.
content.summary: Triangle woith no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I used to live close to a military air base and at night (not every night, but when i did hear it, it was always around 2-3am) i would hear these sounds. they would last about 15-20 minutes and i can only described them as 'close encounter' sounds... you know like the 'communication tones' they have in the film? 

the first night i didn't think much of it, as i thought i had just had one of those 'you dream you are awake, but you're not'-dreams. but then i heard it more often. it really freaked me out as i lived on my own at the time and i really started to doubt my own sanity as far as that i really started to think it might be ufos, because i could only hear the tones, but no 'air plane engine' sound to go with it. 

i told my boyfriend (now husband) about it, and when he spend the night we agreed i would wake him up if i heard it again. i am sure he thought that when he heard it he would be able to reassure me easily and explain what it was... but, when i did wake him up, even he seemed a bit freaked, although i could tell he was trying not to let on. so... we got up and got dressed and went outside to see where it was coming from (i hadn't had the courage to do anything more than look out of my bedroom window before). we walked around for quite some time, and both agreed the sound was coming from the sky, but he also couldn't hear engine noises... the noise went away almost as soon as we started walking around outside (which was odd as it normally lasted much longer on other nights, so i was a bit disappointed as it kept us from finding where the sound came from) after about 10-15 minutes we decided to go back home and to bed. 

it crossed my mind that one of my neighbours could be pranking... but realistically the sounds were too loud and clear (i.E. not muffled by walls, unless they had a huge open window or where outside themselves) for it, and my partner also agreed the sounds seemed to be coming from the sky rather than a nearby building. 

the airbase i lived close to is volkel airbase. this is a dutch airbase, but it has americans stationed there to look after the nukes. (this is not publicly admitted to by the government but common knowledge among locals and former dutch prime minister ruud lubbers recently publicly admitted to this - possibly by accident).

i also know they have/had awacs there. so in the end we decided that it must have been the awacs radar making the sound when it's flying at night. 
(don't know how it can 'hover' over the same 2-block area that long though) 

still, after all this time i am not 100% convinced this is true though. is it? does an awacs make 'close encounter' tone noises when engaging it's radar at night? or maybe even another 'silent' military airplane we haven't heard about yet? 

btw, i do know what an owl sounds like, and a fox or whatever... but this was definitely not an 'natural' sound. if you would have said my neighbour was playing his keyboard very loudly in the middle of night you would be closer... (but not quite). 

you might also want to know that there were no high rise buildings for miles, but there are some electricity pylons only about 500 yards away...

all this happened at the end of 2001/beginning of 2002 (i heard it on at least 3 separate occasions, probably more but i know it was at least twice before i mentioned it to my boyfriend.) i have been trying to find out what it was off and on ever since.  since 2010-11 more weird sounds seem to have been heard by people around the world, but going through the videos on youtube, none of them really seem to hit the mark, as most of those seem to be a hum or metallic sound.

i thought that if it was military experimental planes i would have heard about it by now, but... nothing so far. but maybe you might know something that the general public don't know yet. if so, i'd love to hear your take on this.

thanks very much in advance,

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Tones heard, not unlike the communication tones in 'close encounters' (but not quite).

content.detailedDescription: Driving north east on frontage road i-35 hubururtus road north cliff entrance i observed a falling trail of lights descending like classic burn trail of meteirr vertically to field near cell phone tower vicinity of old nacodoches road.  appeared to be burned out clearly falling near vertical.
content.summary: Probable meterior or sattelite impact

content.detailedDescription: After being burglarized, i purchased and installed an infrared video system. this is what i caught on video. for years, i thought maybe they were some form of spirit, being that i live near a civil war battlefield, until my friend enlightened me to the existence of aliens on out planet.
content.summary: Orbs, grays looking through window, and other kinds of aliens

content.detailedDescription:
I want to make it clear, the background noise you hear in the video, the dogs barking are not the noises i heard that caused me to go outside!
i was at home at my computer working at about 11:55 pm. 03/26/2015 when i heard coyotes going crazy, sounded like a hundred of them. i have never heard anything like this in my life. we live in the country and hear coyotes often. never anything like this. sounded like they were being electrocuted. the sounds were dramatic, so dramatic that i went outside. at first i saw only one object in the northern sky moving up down side to side fast. i went back inside to get my phone called my wife to come out she did and i started video recording the object. while recording another object shot into the picture. way too close together to be jets or any aircraft that i know of.. nothing i know of can move like that.. now in the video, it looks like the objects are disappearing and reappearing. there are tree limbs between us and the objects. this gives the illusion the objects are disappearing when in reality they are passing between the tree limbs and us. the background noise, the dogs barking in the video are not the noises i heard that caused me to go outside. the coyotes had stopped going crazy by the time i started recording and the dogs were just responding to them. "i know those are dogs you hear". i have no idea what these objects in the sky were but we have never seen anything like it. wild night and lights in north mississippi!!!
content.summary: Two objects moving erratically in the northern night sky lots of animals howling like crazy got it on video

content.detailedDescription:
while i was waiting across the street from the horse ranch(address above)i was sitting on the curb 10 feet away from the lamp. sitting down, i was waiting to be picked up by my dad. 

  about 20 minutes of waiting, i heard a rustling in the bushes about 40 feet from where i was sitting, and the rattling stopped. i stood to see who it was. a very large robotic figure came out. it had 2 short back robotic legs, a large, egg like robotic body, and very long, wide arms that was also used to support the body. the head was actually a helmet, and inside, i could see a human, he had short black hair, black, normal looking eyes, normal face, caucasian, normal looking human. the body was shiny, and looked liked polished silver and black chrome. the feet were small, and the hands were in a knuckled fist. it walked like an ape and on all fours.

  the creature walked to the other side of the road and quickly disappeared. when my dad came to pick me up, i was standing on the sidewalk waving to him, and he passed me right up, as if i was invisible. but he could see me later on.
content.summary: No ufo in the area
